tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: On the bookmark - the code for the text in the book.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Numbers mean page, line and word.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: Greece, thunder, God, lightning.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is ZEUS. Take films with letters ZEUS and attach to the envelope #2.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: The front part of the frame is removable.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Flip the painting over and use a coin to identify the required letters.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: You got the letters mmseuu.

tips.name: Tip 4
tips.text: Museum and pyramid.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is Louvre. Take films with letters LOUVRE and attach to the envelope #3.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Cut the edge of the manuscript along the line.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: You can see a word on the end of the manuscript.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is Mull.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: There are spots on the manuscript pages.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Transfer all the spots onto a piece of paper using carbon paper.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is York.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Assemble a model using four wooden pieces.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Attach the model to the center-spread of the manuscript.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: The holes in the model reveal the British flag on the left and the symbol of France on the right.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is Channel Tunnel.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: There are drawings in the manuscript, choose the correct ones.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: The required drawings are under a lock with a key and behind a closed door.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: Stone and circle.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is Stonehenge.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: The symbol sketch somehow repeats the turn of the painting.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: The dots in the symbol indicate the required letters on the back of the painting.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is Glasgow.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Attach panels with letters and numbers to the frame and insert the map into it.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Mark all the received points on the map and get the answer from the letters on the frame.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is GLOBE. Take films with the letters GLOBE and attach to the envelope #4.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: The swords fit the holes in the tunnel.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: The shapes on the swords match the shapes of the holes in the tunnel.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: Insert all the swords with the number one into the required holes. You will see the first letter in the tunnel.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is SCONE. Take films with the letters SCONE and attach to the envelope #5.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: The hole in the chest will help to determine what a, b, c, d are equal to.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: a = three, b = one, c = five, d = two. Replace the values on page nineteen and solve the puzzle.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: The code for the chest is three seven two.

tips.name: Tip 4
tips.text: Apply a stencil to the pages five and eighteen.

tips.name: Tip 5
tips.text: Cut the book in the middle and rearrange the pages in the required order.

tips.name: Tip 6
tips.text: A new word was formed at the fore edge of the book.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is MAN.
